data.message: He is being as real as he can be as always people talking shit about him if you were true fans you would at least respect how honest he is being as he says he is only human he has feelings he cares alot about his fans and especially what they think about him and his work he says shit he fucks up don't we all and he is still talented as fuck I don't care what anyone says or there opinions I've been a fan since day one and still am 👊
